攜.definition: to carry; to take along; to bring along; to hold (hands); also pr. [xi1]

攜家帶口.definition: (idiom) to take all one's family along; encumbered by a family; tied down by family obligations

攜家帶眷.definition: to take all one's family along (idiom); encumbered by a family; tied down by family obligations

攜帶.definition: to carry (on one's person); to support (old); Taiwan pr. [xi1 dai4]

攜帶者.definition: (medicine) carrier (of a recessive gene, virus etc)

攜手.definition: hand in hand; to join hands; to collaborate

攜手並肩.definition: hand in hand and shoulder to shoulder

攜手同行.definition: to walk hand in hand; to cooperate

攜款.definition: to take funds (esp. illegally or corruptly obtained)

攜眷.definition: accompanied by one's dependents; encumbered by wife and children

攜程.definition: Trip.com Group, largest travel agency in China, formerly named Ctrip (until 2019)
